amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to carry out requirements relating to electronic logging devices.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3669 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3669 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5502) To prohibit the use of funds to carry out requirements relating to electronic logging devices.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3669 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Fischer to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3669 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
